abstract: After a four-year renovation, the National Maritime Museum in Amsterdam has reopened, with a renewed focus on experiencing the Netherlands' seafaring history through interactive presentations, voyage simulations and life-sized seafaring replicas.
snippet: After a four-year renovation, the National Maritime Museum in Amsterdam has reopened, with a renewed focus on experiencing the Netherlands' seafaring history through interactive presentations, voyage simulations and life-sized seafaring replicas.
lead_paragraph: After a four-year renovation, the National Maritime Museum in Amsterdam reopened yesterday, with a renewed focus on experiencing the Netherlands' seafaring history through interactive presentations, voyage simulations and life-sized seafaring replicas.

headline.main: Reimagined Maritime Museum in Amsterdam Opens
